channel.title: Giant List Of SCAR Scripts (210) (Not Just Mopar)
channel.description:
Here is a list of SCAR Scripts from all over the web!
Credits To Newbienewty (Me) Credits to Un - Named For Helping Name All of The Links! Credits To Mr.Chris (For the Mopar Scripts) Credits To Scar - Scripts.com Credits To the Script Authors
I did not test nor make these scripts so don't put error's here.
More to be posted, i have to go to driver's training after school and class is almost over, I'll post more when I get home around 7:00 p.m.
Post if you use one of these scripts please!
Mining
[url=http://forum.scar-scripts.com/showthread.php?t=445] INFminer - Infantry001 [/url] [url=http://forum.scar-scripts.com/showthread.php?t=111] Ess Miner - solemn [/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265.0.html] Varrock Ess Miner - solemn [/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3629.0.html] Awesome Powerminer - RealRune item.title: Giant List Of SCAR Scripts (210) (Not Just Mopar)
item.dc:creator: @ikkomuitrs ikkomuitrs
item.description:
@ikkomuitrs wrote:

where do u need to press this? Set Colours(Lines 40-48) and Specifications(Lines 52-59) ??

and this: Set The Following}

rockwait = 4500; {Time between each click in (ms) 1000ms= 1sec }
rockcolor = iron; {What type of ore would you like to mine ?}
Antiban2 = true; {Do you want to use Antiban function?(suggested)}
Rdirection = ‘N’; {If attacked, in what direction do you want to run?}
LoadsD = 500; {How many loads do you want to do?}
Pickaxew = true; {Is your pickaxe weild?}
Autotalk = true; {Autotalk?}
Nickname = ‘aseb’; {Type 3-4 letters of your runescape username}??

Read full topic
item.source: Giant List Of SCAR Scripts (210) (Not Just Mopar)

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

NewbieNewty:

I don’t understand =[

Ok, take “http://www.scar-scripts.com/index.php?p=viewscript&id=567” in your script, change it to:

[.url=http://www.scar-scripts.com/index.php?p=viewscript&id=567]Script name - by Person[/url]

No period in [url=
